Description: On I-295 at mile marker 50 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 51.8 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On Rt. 629 in the County of Warren, in the vicinity of Rocky Hollow Rd; Rt. 628N/S (Warren County), motorists can expect potential delays due to standing water. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Standing Water - Closed

Description: On VA-234 North in the County of Prince William, in the vicinity of Clover Hill Rd, motorists can expect delays due to an incident. Lane closures exist.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Other Traffic

Description: On Rt. 620 in the County of Warren, in the vicinity of Bennys Beach Rd; Dead End, motorists can expect potential delays due to standing water. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
